body:

Colin Manning

2011 SOFT6007 Class 16 2011 SOFT6007 Class 13 2011 SOFT6007 Class 12 Online Class: Image maps Notes Online Class: Image maps 2011 SOFT6007 Class 08 Online Class: Tables Notes Online Class: Tables 2011 SOFT6007 Class 05 Online Class: Lists Online Class: Images in HTML documents 2011 SOFT6007 Class 01 Online Class: Introduction to the Internet Notes Online Class: Introduction to the Internet SOFT6007 Ev Week 10 Part 2 Video SOFT6007 Ev Week 10 Part 1 Video SOFT6007 Class 37 Audio SOFT6007 Class 35 A Video SOFT6007 Class 34 A Video SOFT6007 Class 34 B Video SOFT6007 EV Week 09 Video Part 2 SOFT6007 EV Week 09 Video Part 1 SOFT6007 Class 33 Video SOFT6007 Class 30 A Video SOFT6007 Class 29 Audio SOFT6007 Class 28 Video SOFT6007 Class 25 Video CSS Slides SOFT6007 Class 21 Video SOFT6007 EV Week 06 Video SOFT6007 EV Week 05 Video Class 17 Audio Recorded 2010.03.02 SOFT6007 EV Week 04 Video SOFT6007 Class 15 B Video SOFT6007 Class 14 B Video SOFT6007 EV Week 03 Video SOFT6007 Class 07B Video SOFT6007 Class 06B Video SOFT6007 Class 06B Video SOFT6007 EV Week 02 Video SOFT6007 Class 05 SOFT6007 Class 04 Sample Page 3 Source SOFT6007 Class 04 Sample Page 3 SOFT6007 Class 04 Audio SOFT6007 Class 03B Video SOFT6007 Class 03A Video SOFT6007 Class 02B Video SOFT6007 Class 02A Video SOFT6007 Evening Week 01 SOFT6007 Class 01 Video Online Class 02: HTML Basics Online Class 02: Notes Online Class 03: Images in HTML Documents House Rules for HTML Online Class 06: Going Live! Online Class 07: Image Maps Exercise I Online Class 08: Digital Color - Part I Online Class 09: Digital Color - Part II Online Class 10: Adding Color to Web Pages Online Class 11: Designing with Tables Online Class 12: JavaScript I Online Class 12: JavScript I Online Class 13: JavaScript II Online Class 14: JavaScript III
author: Chris Love

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 02: HTML Basics
episodes.description: Hypertext Mark-Up Language is the special code used to describe web page content. In this class we look at how text in gerenral is stored and how HTML extends plain text's capabilities to include formatting.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 03: Images in HTML Documents
episodes.description: This class looks at how image files can be included in a web page. Images cannot be embedded directly into pages, so a link to an external file must be provided.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 06: Going Live!
episodes.description: In this class we see how to publish you website on Yahoo! Geocities.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 07: Image Maps Exercise I
episodes.description: Build a web page using the image provided. Link to la.html, sf.html, lv.html and  no.html.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 08: Digital Color - Part I
episodes.description: Although we deal with color every day, we rarely have to put numbers on it. In this class we look at how color can be represented numerically using the Hue, Saturation, Brightness (HSB) system.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 09: Digital Color - Part II
episodes.description: In this class we continue our look at how color can be represented digitally. The Red Green Blue (RGB) color system is used by most computer systems. The Cyan Magenta Yellow Black (CMYK) system is used by the printing industry.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 10: Adding Color to Web Pages
episodes.description: In this class we see how HTML uses the RGB system to the specify color of text and backgrounds.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 11: Designing with Tables
episodes.description: This class illustrates how tables can be used to code more complex web pages.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 12: JavaScript I
episodes.description: This class provides an introduction to the JavaScript scripting language, that can be used to add functionality to web pages.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 13: JavaScript II
episodes.description: In this class we look at how to add rollovers using JavaScript.

podcast.title: Cork Institute of Technology: Computing: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals
podcast.description: SOFT6007 Web Development Fundamentals. Lecturer: Colin Manning. This course is being taken by Stage 1 students. The course covers primarily HTML, with introductions to CSS and JavaScript

episodes.title: Online Class 14: JavaScript III
episodes.description: Alerts and Dialogs can be used to get the user's attention and to solicit input. The input can alter the behavior of the page.
